PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-07022004-05-17,  EC,  IA&ND,  ,  , 
ActJames Bay and Northern Quebec Agreement
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT CONNELLY, Acting President of the Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency, to be administrator in the case of matters involving federal jurisdiction for the purpose of sections 22 and 23 of the James Bay and Northern Quebec Agreement, to hold office during pleasure, in the place of Sidney Gershberg.
AttachmentsAttachment
